item.description:
Happy New Year everyone!! Sorry for the short notice for the first impromptu fly-out of 2011. It is such a great day, I thought I would start the year off right and get those hours cranking. Mark E. and I are taking off around 1 in the Warrior to some place to be determined. Steve Bortle is taking the Gruman and will be joining us with a second plane. If you are interested in getting out please meet us at the Building 13.
I may be able to take one passenger and Steve may as well.

Gary and Steve

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: First fly-out for 2011
